name: Sentinel Satellite
desc: When the character's HP is lower than 50%, they gain a Shield that can absorb DMG equal to 20% of their Max HP for 2 turn(s). This effect can only be triggered 1 time(s) by each character per battle.
enhanced_desc: When the character's HP is lower than 50%, they gain a Shield that can absorb DMG equal to 30% of their Max HP for 2 turn(s). This effect can only be triggered 1 time(s) by each character per battle.
